TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormatConvertedBitmap extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public NotInheritable Class FormatConvertedBitmap Inherits BitmapSource Implements ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 为 提供像素格式转换功能。

span.span: Provides pixel format conversion functionality for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。 implements the interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. 只能在对象初始化过程中进行属性更改。Property changes can occur only during object initialization. 调用发出信号初始化已开始和发出信号初始化已完成。Call to signal that initialization has begun and to signal that initialization has completed. 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。After initialization, property changes are ignored. 使用创建的对象构造函数将自动初始化，并且将忽略属性更改。 objects created using the constructor are automatically initialized, and property changes are ignored. 格式之间的转换具有不同特征的 RGB 颜色空间应使用类。For format conversions between RGB color spaces with different characteristics, the class should be used. 颜色空间之间的转换需要源颜色配置文件和目标域映射提供可靠的颜色转换颜色配置文件。Conversions between color spaces need a source color profile and destination color profile for gamut mapping to provide a reliable color conversion. 颜色配置文件由参数或和属性。The color profiles are provided by the parameters of the or by the and properties. 如果应用转换之后，将图像保存到文件，则必须更新与映像数据相关的元数据标记。Metadata tags related to image data must be updated if an image is saved to a file after a transform is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口来优化多个属性上的初始化。 implements the interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties. 若要初始化使用此构造函数创建的你必须执行之间的属性初始化和调用。To initialize a created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between and calls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的对象将自动初始化。 objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized. 初始化后，将忽略属性更改。After initialization, property changes are ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double AlphaThreshold { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置将位图转换为可识别 Alpha 颜色的托盘化格式时，位图的 Alpha 通道阈值。

span.span: Gets or sets the alpha channel threshold of a bitmap when converting to palletized formats that recognizes an alpha color.

value.span: 该 的 Alpha 通道阈值。

span.span: The alpha channel threshold for this .
The default value is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值用于确定的不透明度级别将映射到转换后的格式完全透明的颜色。The value is used to determine what level of opacity will be mapped to the fully transparent color in the converted format. 9.8 值意指小于 25 的 alpha 值与任何像素，将映射到透明的颜色。A value of 9.8 implies that any pixel with an alpha value of less than 25 will be mapped to the transparent color. 100 的值将映射不是完全不透明的透明颜色的所有像素。A value of 100 maps all pixels which are not fully opaque to the transparent color. 目标调色板应提供透明的颜色;否则，透明颜色将接近零，通常黑色的一个。The destination palette should provide a transparent color; otherwise, the transparent color will be the one closest to zero, often black. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
